alert.note: Alert for Pearl River (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 3:23PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central St. Tammany, south central Washington Parishes in southeastern Louisiana and southwestern Pearl River Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 320 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Picayune, moving west at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Picayune, Sun, Bush and Lacombe. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 12 between mile markers 73 and 74. Interstate 59 in Mississippi between mile markers 1 and 15. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
